ContinuousBIT_System_General

Continuous Built-In Test flags for general system information

Bits 0-7 of the original 128 bit Continuous Built-In Test flags

Bitmasks

Bitmasks for general system flags

SYSTEM_CLOCK_FAILURE

0x01 - The system clock is not operating properly

POWER_FAULT

0x02 - Power supply voltage is outside the recommended range, or an internal power fault exists

FIRMWARE_FAULT

0x10 - System firmware has detected an unexpected or abnormal condition

TIMING_OVERLOAD

0x20 - The system is unable to keep up with the processing demand

BUFFER_OVERRUN

0x40 - A data buffer in the system has reached its capacity

flags
uint8 flags() const

Gets the value of the general system flags (bits 0-7)

Returns
uint8

Value of the general system flags

systemClockFailure
bool systemClockFailure() const

Gets the value of the System Clock Failure bit (bit 0)

Returns
bool

true: The system clock is not operating properly

powerFault
bool powerFault() const

Gets the value of the Power Fault bit (bit 1)

Returns
bool

true: Power supply voltage is outside the recommended range, or an internal power fault exists

firmwareFault
bool firmwareFault() const

Gets the value of the Firmware Fault bit (bit 4)

Returns
bool

true: System firmware has detected an unexpected or abnormal condition

timingOverload
bool timingOverload() const

Gets the value of the Timing Overload bit (bit 5)

Returns
bool

true: The system is unable to keep up with the processing demand

bufferOverrun
bool bufferOverrun() const

Gets the value of the Buffer Overrun bit (bit 6)

Returns
bool

true: A data buffer in the system has reached its capacity
